input.sentences: the old location location town 's cemetery is oddly comforting and quiet in the deep january snow .
the town boasts many charming old houses .
this is an old two story home that housed soldiers during the civil war .
the creek that runs behind the house proved useful in keeping soldiers hydrated .
the town also has modern amenities such as a fully functioning fire department .
output.sentences: The snow quietly separates each old head stone.
Snow will bring things together in such a fashion as making two floors appear as one.
The contrast with snow can make buildings and entryways appear as floating.
Water in streams or rivers appear separate from the snow element, despite being the same element.
By hiding parking or even walkways snow can also make buildings appear to have been built in strange locations.
